title: Did Nikola Tesla invent a Death Beam to try and end all wars?
description:
Who was Nikola Tesla and what did he invent? Who won the electricity wars - Tesla or Edison? Did Tesla invent the car named after him? For free home activities sign-up at www.WhoSmarted.com
